PositionHistory.Title: Business Transformation Support Lead (On-Site)
PositionHistory.Description:
Indore for a leading hospital chain in India
Processes covered:
1. Procurement of Medical and Non-medical Supplies and Hospital Inventory Management
2. In-patient & Out-Patient - Registration to Discharge cycle, Billing and Collection
3. Medical & Non-medical transportation
Methodology used:
1. Identification of each sub-level process and discussion with relevant stakeholder
2. Performing analytics on various data objects with the help of system level reports
3. Listing various gaps based on process and system understanding
4. Citing the risk impact and root cause
5. Devised various corrective/preventive action plans
6. Quantification of the cost and revenue impact

solution for one of the world's largest telecom players across Egypt assisting them to track their fixed assets from an acquire-to-retire stage

Apr 2018 - Nov 2018

Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) solution for one of the world's largest telecom players across Egypt assisting them
to track their fixed assets from an acquire-to-retire stage
Key Deliverables:
1. Master Data Creation and Management:
Enterprise Asset Management

warehouse and site inventories respectively
the data analysis, sanitization, streamlining, conjunction and presentation of data points from procurement, inventory and
Network Operating Centre to make them sync with the new Asset management
Business Transformation Support Lead (On-Site)
Nov 2018 - May 2019
Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) solution for one of the world's largest telecom players across Egypt assisting them
to track their fixed assets from an acquire-to-retire stage
Identifying the key risks & re-engineer processes for risk transformation.
Ensure the client's smooth transition to the EAM solution with respect to people and operational readiness
Assessing the impact of the change coming from new solution by understanding the client's current asset management
practices holistically and mapping them against the respective activities under the new solution
Managing stakeholders across various functions viz Networks, SCM, Finance, Global MDM, etc., understanding their risks
& challenges and recommending efficient solutions to mitigate these risks
Central SPOC for multiple functions across the client during the implementation phase
Executing Vendor on-boarding pertaining to the new EAM solution
Delivered training as a part of the knowledge transfer and hand-holding of 40+ client stakeholders from different disciplines
on the SAP based EAM solution.
Performed internal process audit for 3 locations - Navi Mumbai, Nashik, Indore for a leading hospital chain in India
Processes covered:
1. Procurement of Medical and Non-medical Supplies and Hospital Inventory Management
2. In-patient & Out-Patient - Registration to Discharge cycle, Billing and Collection
3. Medical & Non-medical transportation

2. Performing analytics on various data objects with the help of system level reports

4. Citing the risk impact and root cause

6. Quantification of the cost and revenue impact
